name: Twine test 2
description:
the second day of edits

  • Made with the online version of https://twinery.org/ Twine
  • images hosted via random online sites and a personal https://github.com/ account
  • sound hosted via https://www.yola.com/
    • make a free site and host images and (very short) mp3 files 
    • total size limit for hosting images and mp3s is 5 megs
